Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lunt/Sheridan
ShortDescription: Westbound 96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland, and Lunt due to, street blockage near Lunt/Sheridan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland, and Lunt due to, street blockage near Lunt/Sheridan.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
